Posts.Content: Zoe001 wrote: I'm not sure what happens now and what to expect . Still waiting to hear what the plan is and feeling like I should be doing something immediately. Is there a need to rush treatment? I worry that the longer nothing happens the bigger the tumour is getting. What should I expect to happen next during treatment or surgery? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed with brain tumour Zoe001 bhd1
